english: plot

chinese: 这个故事有一个浪漫的情节
english: this story has a romantic plot
sequence

chinese: 按照这样的顺序，分三步把大象放进冰箱
english: follow the three-step sequence to put the elephant into the fridge
variety
there is a wide variety of tomatoes
hitherto

chinese: 到目前为止，王子的意中人还没有出现
english: hitherto, the prince's Miss Right has not been here
usage

chinese: 老师在黑板上写了这个单词的正确用法
english: the teacher wrote out the correct usage of the word on the board
groan

chinese: 这个女人因剧烈的头痛而大声呻吟起来
english: the woman loudly groaned due to her splitting headache
limitation
there's a limitation on what he can see
dawn

chinese: 田野里的公鸡在黎明时分打鸣
english: the rooster standing on the field crows at dawn
approach

chinese: 这艘船正以很快的速度靠近码头
english: the boat is approaching the jetty at a high speed
hive

chinese: 这个蜂巢里住了很多蜜蜂
english: many bees live in this hive
homogeneous

chinese: 与大城市相比，这个古镇的人口种族单一
english: the old town is ethnically homogeneous compared with the big city
complex

chinese: 他对如何解决这个复杂的案件毫无头绪
english: he has no clue about how to solve this complex case
groove

chinese: 大多数的滑动门都在凹槽里移动
english: most sliding doors move inside the grooves
intrude

chinese: 一个坏人拿着刀闯入了我的房子
english: a bad guy intruded into my house with a knife
